Flexible function to generate bounding boxes

Source: R/geo-functions.R
geo_bb.Rd

Takes a geographic object or bounding box as an input and outputs a bounding box, represented as a bounding box, corner points or rectangular polygon.

geo_bb(shp, scale_factor = 1, distance = 0, output = c("polygon",
  "points", "bb"))

Arguments

shp

Spatial object (from sf or sp packages)
scale_factor

Numeric vector determining how much the bounding box will grow or shrink. Two numbers refer to extending the bounding box in x and y dimensions, respectively. If the value is 1, the output size will be the same as the input.
distance

Distance in metres to extend the bounding box by
output

Type of object returned (polygon by default)

See also

bb_scale

Examples

plot(geo_bb(routes_fast, distance = 100), col = "red")
#> Assuming a geographical (lat/lon) CRS (EPSG:4326)
#> Transforming to CRS +proj=aeqd +lat_0=53.81648627 +lon_0=-1.53133395 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84
plot(geo_bb(routes_fast, scale_factor = 0.8), col = "green", add = TRUE)
plot(geo_bb(sp::bbox(routes_fast)), add = TRUE) # works on bb also
plot(geo_bb(routes_fast, output = "points"), add = TRUE)
# Simple features implementation:
bb_sf1 <- geo_bb(routes_fast_sf, scale_factor = c(2, 1.5))
bb_sf2 <- geo_bb(routes_fast_sf, c(2, 1.5), distance = 100)
#> Assuming a geographical (lat/lon) CRS (EPSG:4326)
#> Transforming to CRS +proj=aeqd +lat_0=53.816446 +lon_0=-1.5309755 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84
plot(bb_sf1)
plot(bb_sf2, add = TRUE)
plot(routes_fast, add = TRUE)
plot(geo_bb(routes_fast_sf, output = "points"), add = TRUE)
bb_matrix <- geo_bb(routes_fast, scale_factor = c(2, 1.1), output = "bb")
plot(routes_fast_sf[2:5, ], bbox = bb_matrix)
#> Warning: plotting the first 9 out of 16 attributes; use max.plot = 16 to plot all
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
#> Warning: "bbox" is not a graphical parameter
